p.k: Charlie Ottley explores the Lowlands starting in the heart of the Colombian Amazon, where he mingles with local tribes, sleeps rough in the jungle and discovers a tasty recipe for rodent stew. He also gets the chance to try out some Colombian wine at one of the country's only wine spas. Charlie finally saddles up for some time at the ranch as he rides out onto the great plains of the Llanos in search of lunch.
